volume type¶

Volume v1

volume type create¶

Create new volume type

os volume type create
    [--property <key=value> [...] ]
    <name>
--property <key=value>¶

Set a property on this volume type (repeat option to set multiple properties)

<name>

New volume type name

volume type delete¶

Delete volume type

os volume type delete
    <volume-type>
<volume-type>

Volume type to delete (name or ID)

volume type list¶

List volume types

os volume type list
    [--long]
--long¶

List additional fields in output

volume type set¶

Set volume type properties

os volume type set
    [--property <key=value> [...] ]
    <volume-type>
--property <key=value>¶

Property to add or modify for this volume type (repeat option to set multiple properties)

<volume-type>

Volume type to modify (name or ID)

volume type unset¶

Unset volume type properties

os volume type unset
    [--property <key>]
    <volume-type>
--property <key>¶

Property to remove from volume type (repeat option to remove multiple properties)

<volume-type>

Volume type to modify (name or ID)
